005C84D8 00000000

005C84D8 00000001

[60+ FPS v1.0]
205C84D0 00000000
{In theory, it is the fastest, but it will affect the (Game Speed) code, leading to failure and freezing.}

[60 FPS v1.0]
205C84D0 00000001
{Game Runs Faster.}

[Default 30 FPS v1.0]
205C84D0 00000002

[20 FPS v1.0]
205C84D0 00000003

[10 FPS v1.0]
205C84D0 00000006

[Game Speed∞ v1.0]
205C84D8 000000FF
{The fastest, but no practical value, like in fast forward movies. And it will freeze.}

[Game Speed∞- v1.0]
205C84D8 00000064
{ditto.}

[Game Speed++++++ v1.0]
205C84D8 00000032
{It works normally, but it's still too fast. You can't control it.}

[Game Speed+++++ v1.0]
205C84D8 00000016
{Very fast, if the equipment is weak, you can try it.}

[Game Speed++++ v1.0]
205C84D8 00000009
{Faster. If you feel uncomfortable too soon, Then use the following code.}

205C84D8 00000003
{Faster.}

[Game Speed+ v1.0]
205C84D8 00000002
{A little faster.}

[Default Game Speed v1.0]
205C84D8 00000001

205C84D0 00000000
{In theory, it is the fastest, but it will affect the (Game Speed) code, leading to failure and freezing.}
